COMBAT[Shrumal_Ogre]: SIDESLASH | UPSLASH | Cyclone_Slash | Great_Slash | FULLDASHSLASH | ANYDASHSLASH + DASHMASTER + OBSCURESKIPS | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS
COMBAT[Glimback]: UPSLASH | SIDESLASH | Cyclone_Slash | Great_Slash | ANYDASHSLASH | SPELLS
COMBAT[Durandoo]: ACID + UPSLASH | SIDESLASH | Cyclone_Slash | Great_Slash | ANYDASHSLASH | FIREBALL | SCREAM
COMBAT[Nightmare_King]: (FIREBALL>1 | QUAKE>1 | SCREAM>1 | (MILDCOMBATSKIPS | CURSED) + SPELLS>1) + (FULLDASH | ANYDASH + MILDCOMBATSKIPS | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS) + NAILCOMBAT
COMBAT[Radiance]: FULLDASH + (FULLSHADOWDASH | QUAKE) + (FIREBALL>1 | SCREAM>1 | (MILDCOMBATSKIPS | CURSED) + (FIREBALL | SCREAM) | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS) + (UPSLASH | MILDCOMBATSKIPS + (SIDESLASH | GREATSLASH) | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS)
1HIT: MASKSHARDS>3 | Can_Bench + (FRAGILEHEART | Lifeblood_Heart + NOTCHES>$SafeNotchCost[8] | Lifeblood_Core | Joni's_Blessing + NOTCHES>$SafeNotchCost[27])
